attributes.action: discuss reducing none working benefits inline with minimum wage
attributes.additional_details:
To open discussion in the house with reguards to reducing benefits for people who do not work.
At present the limit is £500 per week.

for someone working a 40 hour week they would have to earn £16 per hour to achieve this!

The current minimum wage is £6.31 and the living wage is £7.65.

When you introduce a disability these figures are even more shocking.
